data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Al Ahmadi, Kuwait not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Ahmadi, Kuwait
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 6,485 believers in Al Ahmadi against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Al Ahmadi. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Al Ahmadi, Kuwait.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Muhamasheen, Akhdam people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Muhamasheen, Akhdam people.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Al Ahmadi
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Al Ahmadi, Kuwait a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Al Ahmadi, Kuwait to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
